import React from "react"; import { NewStoriesContainer } from "../containers/StoriesContainer"; import { Layout, Menu } from "antd"; import { HashLink as Link } from "react-router-hash-link"; function HeaderFooter() { const { Header, Content, Footer } = Layout; return (

 ); } export default HeaderFooter;
